org.hibernate.search.elasticsearch.work.impl

Interface ElasticsearchWork<T>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BulkableElasticsearchWork<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BulkWork, ClearScrollWork, CloseIndexWork, CreateIndexWork, DeleteWork, DropIndexWork, ES2DeleteByQueryWork, ES2FlushWork, ES2OptimizeWork, ES5DeleteByQueryWork, ES5FlushWork, ES5OptimizeWork, ExplainWork, GetIndexSettingsWork, GetIndexTypeMappingsWork, IndexExistsWork, IndexWork, OpenIndexWork, PutIndexSettingsWork, PutIndexTypeMappingWork, RefreshWork, ScrollWork, SearchWork, SimpleBulkableElasticsearchWork, SimpleElasticsearchWork, WaitForIndexStatusWork

    public interface ElasticsearchWork<T>
    A unit of work to be delegated to the Elasticsearch backend.

    Classes implementing this interface know about the data to be sent (the request), but also about how to handle the response (callbacks, exception throwing).

    Author:
    Yoann Rodiere
